battle_manifesto.effect: Increases damage dealt for all troops

expert_swordsmanship.effect: Increases damage dealt for all troops for 2 turns every 4 turns

jeronimo.notes: Multiple 'all troops' offensive effects make him valuable as rally leader

stand_of_arms.effect: Increases damage dealt for all troops

bulwarks.effect: Reduces damage taken for all troops

jessie.notes: Top-right skill is damage dealt buff - makes her best attack/rally joiner

defenders_edge.effect: Reduces damage taken for all troops

sergey.notes: Top-right skill is damage reduction - makes him best garrison joiner

leader_skills.description: Rally leader's 3 heroes provide 9 expedition skills (right-side skills)

joiner_skills.rule: Only the first hero's TOP-RIGHT expedition skill is used per joiner
joiner_skills.stacking: Member skills CAN stack if they are the same effect
joiner_skills.source: Century Games Help Center + BlueStacks guide

rally_mechanics.common_misconception: People think all joiner skills apply with reduced effect - WRONG. Only 1 skill per joiner (top-right of first hero) matters.

troop_ratios.source_note: No official ratios exist - all community-derived consensus

crazy_joe.note: Infantry-heavy (90-100%), infantry engages first and secures kills/points earlier

spender_strategies.premium_players: Invest early in Jeronimo and Alonso
spender_strategies.f2p: Build around accessible heroes, prioritize progress milestones
